Name: Postgres- Create User If Not Exists
Description: Creates a new user account on a Postgres database server
Author: twerthi

Parameters.Name: createPostgresSQLServerName
Parameters.Label: Host name of the Postgres server

Parameters.Name: createPostgreSQLServerPort
Parameters.Label: Port
Parameters.HelpText: Port number the Postgres server listens on.

Parameters.Name: createLoginWithAddUserRights
Parameters.Label: Login name
Parameters.HelpText: Login name of a user with rights to create user accounts.

Parameters.Name: createNewUsername
Parameters.Label: New user name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the new user account to create.

Parameters.Name: createNewUserPassword
Parameters.Label: New user password
Parameters.HelpText: Password for the new user account.
